A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I think that the story of Luke Skywalker has gone off course.  Why did the exertion of projecting his image across the galaxy kill him?  This seems like lazy writing.  The movie was visually stunning and I like the idea of the Resistance fleet being pursued and hounded by the First Order.  The dialogue about war profiteering could have been handled in a smarter manner.  The mirror cave seemed to serve no purpose as well.  The interactions between Rey and Kylo were great.
